description: First differences between n for which sigma(n) < sigma(n+1), which are not 2.
formula: The expansion of A053230 excluding 2's. a(n) = A053230(A053232(n)).
maple: with(numtheory): f := [seq( `if`((sigma(i+1) > sigma(i)),i,print( )), i=1..5000)];seq( `if`(f[i+1] - f[i] <> 2,f[i+1] - f[i],print( )), i=1..2000);
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Jan 10, 2000
